name: Maze of Bouncy Bear
description:
Way back in 1979 your son, Mike, got lost in the secret maze of the now closed restaurant "Bouncy Bear & Mr. Mons's Family Diner". Now your task is to find he and uncover the truth about the restaurant...Controls:
